survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their experience with the companyâ€™s digital onboarding process to identify strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. This question provides a high-level overview of satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding materials were most helpful to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify which resources are most valuable. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding materials were most helpful to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Were there any technical issues you encountered during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to gauge technical challenges. Follow up with open-ended Q4 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Were there any technical issues you encountered during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: If you encountered technical issues, please describe them:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specifics about technical issues. Helps IT teams address recurring problems.

script.question_text: If you encountered technical issues, please describe them:

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the instructions provided during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to assess clarity. Useful for refining communication materials.

script.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the instructions provided during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the digital onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable insights. Useful for qualitative analysis.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the digital onboarding experience?
